alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 10:56PM CDT until May 07 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR WESTERN HENRY...NORTHEASTERN VAN BUREN AND JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Perlee around 1100 PM CDT. Beckwith and Round Prairie Park around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Salina, Glasgow, Lockridge, Germanville, Rome, Mac Coon Access, Merrimac, Westwood, Water Works Park, Oakland Mills, Wayland, Trenton, Oakland Mills Park and Mount Pleasant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
